reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan beautiful, feminine, and soft, with good color and warmth, particularly suitable for crisp fall days or winter weather. They appreciate its quality and comfort, with one customer noting it's not itchy. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits true to size, others mention the arms are about 6 inches too long. Durability is also mixed, with one customer reporting it holds up

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Sweater
items.body: I've only washed/worn this once, but I got several compliments from coworkers. I think it looks a little more high-end than it is. I was surprised with the quality of it. It's a soft texture that's warm for cool weather or a cold office. It did shed a little on my navy pants, but that didn't bother me. The color is pretty true to the pic. I'd say it fits true to size. I'm a 38D about 175lbs, curvier on bottom, and wear 12-14/31 pants. I usually buy med or large tops. I got this in a large, and it fits loose (buttoned) but not oversized or sloppy. I'm thinking about grabbing it in other colors now. Bottom line- get the sweater. It's super cute. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute! Nice quality
items.body: Nice quality and true to size. It is soft and comfortable, has a stretch to it but kept its shape. Perfect burgundy color and weight for fall! Read more
items.author: BLJoy5

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and Cute
items.body: I got the brown one and loved it enough to come back for the gray. This ruffle edge sweater is 6 % WOOL so it has that real fiber feel plus the softness and stretch of acrylic blends. The style is twin-set cardigan with a little attitude. Nothing crazy. Length is perfect on me, 5'7" to my hip. I love where the neckline falls, not as high as the picture shows on me so a short necklace shows nicely. The sleeves are over-long but I don't mind. The brown is a warm chocolate and the gray is a great neutral. I got the xl and usually wear a size 16 and its a little over sized which is what i wanted. I could easily have gone with a L. Read more
items.author: Holly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater - size up!
items.body: Took off one star because it does fit small, but otherwise this is a really high quality, beautiful sweater. I ordered the brown and it's a very rich, deep chocolate brown. Yes, the sleeves are long, but I rolled the cuff up once and it worked fine. Recommend as long as you size up! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not WHITE
items.body: Very cute and so soft. However I ordered WHITE and it is more of a CREAM. I do not need another cream/off white sweater so it will be returned. Read more
items.author: R. G. Young

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as pictured
items.body: Absolutely lovely sweater. Fits true to size except the sleeve are long...which is nothing new for me. Soft, comfortable and flattering top. Very pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: S. Harper

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wrong color from what I ordered
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Love the style of the cardigan. The fabric feels soft and warm, just what I need. Buttoning/unbuttoning the buttons is easy for me since I have ulcers on the ends of my fingers and have a few fingertips amputated. I was so excited to receive the package in such a timely manner, imagine my deep disappointment as I opened the package and saw it was a CREAM color and not WHITE as I ordered!!! The model in the picture is wearing white. The color choice said “White”. Read more
items.author: NJohnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Five bananas out of five!
items.body: Softest sweater ever! Love all the ruffles! First off, the ruffles. Oh, the ruffles! I feel like a walking celebration—like a maitake mushroom met a dandelion puff and decided to become a sweater. Elegant, classy, and just the right amount of fabulousness. I’ve received so many compliments! Now let’s talk about the sleeves. Ruffled edges and long; ideal for dramatic gestures and pointing the way for Ebenezer Scrooge. It would be the perfect fit for me if it wasn’t for one thing…apparently this seller thinks I am an orangutan! These sleeves are so long, I think I could wrap them around a tree trunk…twice. I am 100% convinced the manufacturer had primates in mind when they created these cute and cozy sweaters! The real deal is the fabric. This sweater is spun from the sighs of clouds and the dreams of alpacas. It’s a buttery-soft blend of something magical. Maybe moonlight and spider webs? It’s warm without being heavy; perfect for an Autumn stroll under the stars. The knit is breathable and has just the right amount of stretch—enough to accommodate any hankering I might have to swing from monkey bar to monkey bar, yet snug enough to make me feel like I’m being gently hugged. Final thoughts: If you have a love for drama, comfort, and sleeves that double as scarves, this sweater is your soulmate. I may never take it off. But seriously, I love, love this sweater for its cushy softness and great style. The thing is--my arms are a normal length and these sleeves fall well below my hands. So………if you have really, really long arms, or you don’t mind scrunching the sleeves up, this sweater will be a great buy for you! Read more
items.author: D. Kirchman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Oatmeal, Grey Pink, Dark Green, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Beige, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
